ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: I notice the same thing too with my piercing.  I had to dump in 20/61 practice point, that I do not know what to do with, into piercing for the skill to start
ygData.messageBody:
I notice the same thing too with my piercing. I had to dump in 20/61
practice point, that I do not know what to do with, into piercing for the
skill to start going up. I think it goes up faster if u hit rather than
missed. It might go up even if missed but faster if hit. After half a lvl
my piercing went from 30 to 75. I hoped this help.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Samiam
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe



-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 11:15 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

Bad news is you won't gain points fast until you begin to approach your max.
It appears that only sucesses or near sucesses gain you skill points from
what I've observed. John or JM correct me if I'm wrong, but I saw my skill
in 1HB slowly gain till it was within 15 points or so of max, then shoot
right up to max in no time, all the while fighting the same critters at the
same level.

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevikazzam@... [mailto:Kevikazzam@...]
Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 2:51 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)


From: Kevikazzam@...

Hello all!
Well i got myself a Dirk , Love the stats , love the effects
.......now if the damn thing would just work right. My question is , how
long
did it take everyone out there to get your piercing skills up ? This is
mainly to the foolish people like me who didn't think to rotate weapons and
keep all skills maxed .....( whoops). I have been in a group and solo for a
day and a half now using my dirk, and my skill level is 7! ( still gotta go
to the guild and throw a point into pierce) So i have 2 more questions 1) if

i throw a point or 2 in to pierce does it make leveling faster from that
point onward ? and 2) because pierce isn't the bards intial attack type , or

perhaps its preffered weapon type ( is that worded ok?? , it might not be )
does it make piercing harder to learn than 1h slash ??
Ok , many thanks .

Ulaien Firesong
lvl 20 bard of Tunare
